EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Today's call (1561733355.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's call (1561733355.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Sandra,
I hope all is well. I called and they said that you will be leaving soon so I thought I would email you as it has been some time since we have spoken. I wanted to ensure that everything is going well and see if there is anything we need to discuss about your business needs. Please let me know. Thank you and have a great Canada Day long weekend.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom| Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
